items.summary: Update the Game page so a user can remove only one brick total per page load/session. After one brick has been removed, all remaining intact bricks must be disabled (no further confirmation dialog, no additional removals).

After the user removes their single allowed brick, display the following exact text behind the brick wall: "Congrats ! You just got your first REAL WORLD ASSET". The text must be visible in the brick-wall area behind/under the grid (i.e., revealed by removal).
Remove the clue/hint section at the bottom of the Game page (including the clue image card and its accompanying hint text), and ensure there is no remaining clue-related UI on /game.
